author: emiglior
body:
This PR superseeds #10071. 
In addition to the previous changes it includes the first round of modifications to fill properly the GEN level infos from pythia8 and NLO Monte Carlo generators.
RECO is not affected.
@maralxplus, @mabarrio This can be of interest for you as well as it affects the format of the trees created by MuScleFit  as it includes an event weight useful for NLO MC,
title: Update for GEN infos in 74X or later
